page.title: 10Poringland Family Life
page.content: A playgroup exists just inside Poringland.We interviewed a mother there who said that the community centre needs replacing and they need places like a sports centre and parks. She has a husband who works in Norwich and a daughter and son.She belongs to 2 social clubs the 'Young Wives' and the P.T.A.The people in Poringland are very friendly.Shopping is done in Norwich and Poringland and she travels by car or walks.Poringland has good schools, attended by the daughter. DAILY ROUTINE: she gets breakfast then takes her daughter to school and her son to playgroup.She then picks him up at 12.30.In the afternoon she does her housework, at 3.30 she picks up her daughter.She then prepares tea,wash and wipes up and then she has the evening to herself.
